data.eml:eml: A new genus and two new species of whiteflies from Australia (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gillespie, Peter S. (2006): A new genus and two new species of whiteflies from Australia (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae). Zootaxa 1306: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173737
